translation.en: [reporter 1] Good day. On this day, July 1st, 2014, at this hour, 0600,
we are at the very first airport in the world…
translation.ko: 바로 이 공항에서 세계 최초로... CW-7은 7년간 많은 논란 속에서

translation.en: [reporter 2] …the topic of so much controversy over the past seven years,
has continued development.
Protests from environmental groups and a number of developing countries continue.
[reporter 1] …it has been claimed that CW-7 is the answer to global warming.
And we are witnessing…
translation.ko: 현실로 다가왔습니다! 지구 온난화 대책에 고심하던 세계 정상은

translation.en: [reporter 2] …world leaders who argue that global warming can no longer be ignored.
translation.ko: 지구 온난화 대책에 고심하던 세계 정상은

translation.en: Today, 79 countries will begin dispersing CW-7 into the upper layers of the atmosphere.
[reporter 3] …upper layers of the atmosphere, and surprisingly,
translation.ko: 대기권 상층에 살포되면 지구 온도가 적정 수준을 되찾을 수 있습니다

translation.en: bring down the average global temperatures to the finest levels.
translation.ko: 지구 온도가 적정 수준을 되찾을 수 있습니다

translation.en: It is just a day away… [reporter 2] …upper layers of the atmosphere.
According to scientists, the artificial cooling substance, CW-7,
translation.ko: 과학계는 인공 냉각 물질인 CW-7 살포에 성공하면

translation.en: will succeed in bringing average global temperatures down to manageable levels
as a revolutionary solution to mankind's warming of the planet.
Head check.
All right, get in line.
Everybody sit down.
One. Two. Three.
Four. Five. Six.
Keep going.
Go on.
Hey, you, sit down.
Curtis. Sit down.
Sit down.
I said, sit down!
-What the fuck are you doing? -Counting.
[young man] Can't you sit and count? Do you wanna get shot? You crazy?
Shut up, Edgar. I'm thinking.
Are there any experienced violinists here? Raise your hands.
Violinist.
Stand up, come forward.
Food. Come and get it.
Violinists? Are they having a laugh?
Those bastards in the front section think they own us.
translation.ko: 앞 칸 자식들은 우리를 종으로 알아

translation.en: Eating steak dinners and listening to string quartets and that.
-We'll be different when we get there. -[sighs]
translation.ko: 앞 칸에 가면 우린 안 그럴 거야

translation.en: I want steak.
[man] Excuse me, sir.
My wife and I played violin in the Boston Symphony Orchestra.
-I was first chair. -[soldier 2] Can you still play?
translation.ko: 제가 수석 연주자였죠 지금도 켤 줄 알아?

translation.en: -Of course. You never forget. -[soldier 2] Show me your hands.
[soldier 2] You, follow me.
Leave your belongings. We just need your hands.
Not both?
Yes, both hands.
My wife, Doris, plays beautifully, better than me.
translation.ko: 제 아내 도리스 연주는 더 아름다워요

translation.en: They just need one person.
Then I won't go!
[woman] Doris! Doris!
-Dory! -[soldier 3] Sit down! Everyone!
-Stop the rationing! -Sit down.
-They can't just-- -Sit down! Now!
Those fucking bastards!
Now isn't the time.
Well, when is the time?
Soon.
[violist] Doris! I'll be back, Doris. It's all right.
I'll come back.
What does steak taste like again?
I had it once, but I can't remember.
translation.ko: 한 번 먹었는데 기억이 안 나

translation.en: [Curtis] If you can't remember, then it's better to forget.
Alright then, what does it smell like when it's cooking?
translation.ko: 그럼 구울 때 냄새가 어떤지라도 알려줘

translation.en: When it's emanating around the place.
Curtis? Is this it?
It's not it.
No. I heard that--
[woman] Curtis! Here!
[Curtis] Timbo.
How's it hanging, buddy?
Give me a pound. Blow it up.
Hey, listen.
Think I need that protein block. How about I trade you?
translation.ko: 있잖아 단백질 블록이 필요한데 우리 바꿀래? 이거랑 저거랑

translation.en: This one for that one.
No.
Nice bargaining powers, Curtis.
-Gimme this one. I'll give you that one. -Hey. Relax, relax, relax.
translation.ko: - 이리 내놔, 이거 줄게 - 잠깐, 잠깐만

translation.en: Come here, Timmy. Come here.
Come right…
I have an idea.
I will give you this one and that one for that one.
-What do you say? -No!
Go get him.
[Edgar] Timmy!
Timothy! Your mom's gonna give you a damn good spanking!
translation.ko: 티미! 그러다 엄마한테 엉덩이 팡팡 맞는다!

translation.en: Dunno where the fuck he went.
Hey, hey, come here! Give us it. Give us it.
You all right, Jose? How're you doing?
-Who did that? -[Edgar] Timmy! -Off you go. -[Edgar] Work with me.
[woman] Why did you let him get up there?
I didn't. He got up there by himself. He's very nimble.
-He's five! -[Edgar] He's a very nimble five year old.
[woman] Timmy! Sweetie, come down.
Hey! Come here.
What do you want for it?
In the whole wide train?
In the whole wide train.
The ball.
The ball?
No. No, I'm sorry. I can't do that. I can't do that.
translation.ko: 공? 그건 안 돼 미안하지만 그건 없어

translation.en: Yes! I get the ball for a whole hour.
[smacks lips] Done.
Curtis, is it time?
Not yet, Tanya. Soon.
[old man] Red letter.
Yeah, it's the one we've been waiting for. Our informant gave us a name.
translation.ko: 네, 기다리고 있었죠 정보원이 이름을 줬네요

translation.en: N-A-M…
[Curtis] Namgoong Minsoo.
He's a security expert. He's in the prison section now.
translation.ko: 보안 전문가인데 지금 감옥 칸에 있어요

translation.en: Wait. You're joking, right? He's in prison.
Hey. Outta here.
-What chance do we have-- -Edgar.
I just think if this guy says that he's such a great security expert,
why can't he break himself--
That's enough! Go.
Let's go, Tim. Come on. Let's go.
Edgar just wants to help, you know?
Thinks the world of you.
He shouldn't worship me the way he does. I'm not who he thinks I am.
translation.ko: 저러지 않으면 좋겠어요 전 대단한 사람 아닙니다

translation.en: Few of us ever are.
Right, we're here.
Tail section. Quarantine section. Prison section.
translation.ko: 우리가 여기 있어요 꼬리 칸이죠 검역 칸, 감옥 칸

translation.en: Gate. Gate. Gate.
Four seconds when all three gates are open at once.
We have four seconds to go through three gates and bust Nam out.
translation.ko: 4초 안에 전부 통과해 냄을 빼내야 해요

translation.en: Then Nam gets us the rest of the way.
Our fate depends on this man.
Yeah.
If we can get him to cooperate, he can get us to the front of the train.
translation.ko: 냄이 협조하면 앞까지 갈 수 있어요

translation.en: Very front section?
Yeah.
From here right to the front of the train. Everything in one stroke.
translation.ko: 여기서 열차 앞 칸까지 단칼에 끝내야 해요

translation.en: We control the engine, we control the world.
translation.ko: 엔진을 장악하면 세상을 장악할 수 있습니다

translation.en: Without that, we have nothing.
All past revolutions failed 'cause they couldn't take the engine.
translation.ko: 엔진을 차지하지 못한 혁명은 모두 실패했어요

translation.en: What are you saying?
This time we take the engine.
Then what?
We kill him.
Wilford?
You should run the train now, not Wilford.
I'm a shadow of my former shadow.
My day was decades ago.
translation.ko: 내 시절은 수십 년 전에 끝났지

translation.en: [Edgar] How old is Gilliam?
Shut up, Edgar.
Listen, I'm not saying I want that to happen. That's not what I'm saying.
translation.ko: 내가 그날을 기다린다는 건 절대 아니야

translation.en: What I mean is, he will die someday.
translation.ko: 하지만 길리엄은 살날이 얼마 안 남았어

translation.en: And when that happens, you're gonna have to take over.
You're gonna have to run the train.
I'm not a leader.
I don't know.
I think you'd be pretty good if you ask me.
-Hey, Edgar. -Hmm?
How far back can you remember?
I dunno, like what? Your mother, you remember her?
I can remember her face…
every once in a while.
But it's not clear.
[soldier] Stay down! Everybody! Everybody stay in your place!
[man] Don't fucking look at me!
-[soldier 1] Get down! -[soldier 2] Keep down!
[soldier 3] You! Let's go! Do I have all day? -Medical check! -All kids come with me.
Just the kids.
-Just a medical check. Doing good. -[soldier 2] Medical inspection!
translation.ko: 애들만 보내 건강 검진이다 - 건강 검진이다 - 잘하고 있어

translation.en: Everybody. All the kids.
All the kids? Again? That's right. Come through.
Stay back there, ma'am. Just stay back there.
Hello? What's this? One more. Yeah. Come on.
translation.ko: 어라, 이건 누구야? 하나 더 있었네, 나와

translation.en: No. All need to go. Come on. No, we don't need-- There's nothing wrong with him.
Just a little medical check, sir. You just stay back there.
translation.ko: 검사만 하면 되니까 뒤에 서 계세요 뒤에 계세요

translation.en: [soldier 1] You. Go and check.
-Don't move. -[Tanya] Go, Timmy. Go!
-Run! -Go!
Timmy!
That's her baby!
Andy!
Give me my son, you fucking bitch!
translation.ko: 내 아들 돌려줘! 이 나쁜 년아!

translation.en: Andy! Andy!
[soldier 1] How did you let him throw his shoe?
translation.ko: 신발 던지는데 안 막고 뭐 해!

translation.en: [Edgar] Timmy! Timmy! Timmy!
At this altitude, we need only seven minutes.
[officer] Seven minutes allotted for your speech, sir.
This is so disappointing.
[in French] This is so disappointing.
-[in Spanish] This is so disappointing. -[in Chinese] This is so disappointing.
No, no, we don't need all that. I've only got seven minutes.
Passengers!
This… is not a shoe.
This is disorder.
This is size-ten chaos.
This, see this? This is death.
In this locomotive we call home,
there is one thing
between our warm hearts and the bitter cold.
[speaker] Clothing? Shields? No. Order.
Order is the barrier that holds back the frozen death.
translation.ko: 질서가 얼어 죽지 않도록 우리를 감싸주지

translation.en: We must all of us, on this train of life,
remain in our allotted station.
We must each of us occupy our preordained particular position.
translation.ko: 각자 미리 지정된 고유의 자리를 지켜야 해

translation.en: Would you wear a shoe on your head? Of course, you wouldn't wear a shoe on your head.
translation.ko: 머리에 신발 쓰고 싶어? 그런 사람 없겠지?

translation.en: A shoe doesn't belong on your head. A shoe belongs on your foot.
translation.ko: 신발 위치는 머리가 아니라 발로 정해져 있거든

translation.en: A hat belongs on your head.
I am a hat. You are a shoe.
I belong on the head. You belong on the foot.
translation.ko: 난 머리에 있고 너희는 발에 있어야 마땅해

translation.en: Yes? So it is.
In the beginning, order was prescribed by your ticket.
First class, economy, and freeloaders like you.
translation.ko: 일등석, 일반석, 그리고 너희 같은 무임승차자들

translation.en: Eternal order is prescribed by the Sacred Engine.
translation.ko: 성스러운 엔진이 정한 질서는 영원히 변치 않아

translation.en: All things flow from the Sacred Engine.
All things in their place.
All passengers in their section.
All water flowing,
translation.ko: 기차 안에 흐르는 모든 물과 난방이

translation.en: all heat rising, pays homage to the Sacred Engine,
translation.ko: 기차 안에 흐르는 모든 물과 난방이 성스러운 엔진을 경외한다

translation.en: in its own particular preordained position.
So it is.
Now, as in the beginning, I belong to the front.
translation.ko: 애초부터 내가 있을 곳은 앞 칸이었고

translation.en: You belong to the tail.
When the foot seeks the place of the head,
a sacred line is crossed.
Know your place!
Keep your place!
Be a shoe!
Well, we have, uh, 42 seconds left.
So, we could go to a comment from Mr. Wilford,
translation.ko: 그럼 윌포드 님의 말씀을 들어보기로 할까

translation.en: the Divine Keeper of the Sacred Engine.
Sir? Mr. Wilford?
Are you there?
Are you there, sir?
Oh, it's breaking up. Uh…
Mr. Wilford's a very busy man.
So it is.
Are we just gonna watch?
-Not now. -I'm not just gonna fucking sit here.
translation.ko: - 보고만 있을 거야? - 때가 아니야 퍼질러 앉아 있을 순 없어

translation.en: No, I'm all right.
[soldier 1] Stop right there! Sit down!
[speaker] Put that useless gun down. Put it away!
Long time no see, Mr. Gilliam. It's a pleasure.
You look healthy.
He's fine!
Minister Mason, please deliver a message to Mr. Wilford.
translation.ko: 메이슨 총리 윌포드 님께 전할 말이 있소

translation.en: -[Mason] Certainly, what shall I say? -Tell him he and I need to talk.
translation.ko: 무슨 말이죠? 얘기 좀 하자고 전하시오

translation.en: Well, you can talk to me.
Mr. Wilford has no reason to visit here.
translation.ko: 윌포드 님이 여기까지 오실 까닭이 없죠

translation.en: Not here. At the front.
translation.ko: 안 와도 돼 앞 칸에서 보자

translation.en: Your son will be a hero, I promise.
Or daughter, whatever it is. [kisses]
Right, I got it. I got it.
Your contribution has been duly noted. Thanks.
Sumimasen. So sorry to interrupt while you're praying.
What you doing? Sorry. Sumimasen.
-[speaking Japanese] -Look. There's your Buddha back. Thanks.
[Edgar] Go, go, go, go, go!
-[man 1] Stop fooling around! -[Edgar yells, grunts]
I've got a better batch.
Stronger, fresh, uncut.
Wanna try some?
How many protein blocks for ten rocks of uncut Kronole?
translation.ko: 무첨가 크로놀 10덩이면 단백질 블록 몇 개지?

translation.en: They don't have bullets.
[Gilliam] Why do you say that?
[Curtis] Remember what Mason said? She said, "Put down that useless gun."
translation.ko: 메이슨이 한 말 기억하세요? 쓸모없는 총 치우라고

translation.en: She meant… she wouldn't give the order to shoot me.
translation.ko: 나를 쏘라고 지시할 생각이 없다는 뜻이겠지

translation.en: No.
No, I think the guns are literally useless.
They used up all their bullets four years ago in the last revolt.
translation.ko: 4년 전 마지막 반란 때 총알을 다 쓴 거예요

translation.en: Bullets are extinct.
If you're wrong, we could be finished before we even start.
translation.ko: 자네가 틀렸다면 시작도 못 해보고 끝나

translation.en: I think we should be patient.
Wait for the next red letter.
[workers] One, two. One, two. [soldier 1] Left. Then right.
No, not yet. Up! Now left.
translation.ko: 아직 아니지, 더 들어! 이제 왼쪽

translation.en: -One, two. One, two. -[workers] One, two. One, two.
[man] Hello, Andrew. Andrew.
Wake up. Rise and shine.
When you dream too much of the sun, you forget the trees.
translation.ko: 태양 꿈만 꾸느라 나무를 잊어서 되겠어?

translation.en: I believe this is your son.
I'm so…
I'm sorry, it's… not very good. It's not my best work.
translation.ko: 미안하네만... 잘 그리지는 못했어 좀 어둡지?

translation.en: It's a little dark. But if you look very deep into the eyes,
translation.ko: 잘 그리지는 못했어 좀 어둡지? 그래도 눈을 오래 들여다보면 희망이 비칠 거야

translation.en: you can see a little bit of hope.
translation.ko: 그래도 눈을 오래 들여다보면 희망이 비칠 거야

translation.en: What about my boy? You got one of Timmy?
Oh, yes, Tanya. I do.
Easy, easy. Come up this easy. You'll hurt yourself.
Here. There you go. Timmy.
Look at him.
Funny little smile.
Curtis, you gotta let me come with you.
[Curtis] No, Tanya, I'm sorry.
You will be if you don't let me come.
I'm going to the front and make that bitch sorry she put her hands on my boy.
translation.ko: 앞 칸에 가서 내 아들 건드린 그년 혼쭐 내줄 거야

translation.en: [Curtis] Make this one tighter.
You know I'm stronger than all these skinny-ass soldiers anyway.
translation.ko: 이 말라깽이 군인들보다 내가 더 센 거 알잖아?

translation.en: Please.
-[alarm blaring] -[man] Shit! What's going on?
They changed the schedule! Move it back!
Now or never! Coming now! Coming now!
[Curtis] Don't panic! Stick to the plan!
Hide that! Hide your weapons in your clothes!
-Head check. -Yay.
Line up.
All right. Sit down.
One. Two. Three.
-Four. -What the fuck do we do?
I've had enough of this protein block bullshit!
Yeah! This is bullshit!
-We're fucking hungry! -[Tanya] We want chicken!
Chicken! Chicken!
Quiet! Be quiet!
It's okay.
[soldier 1] You want him fucking dead. Is that it? Keep quiet!
translation.ko: 이 자식 뒈지는 거 보고 싶어? 조용히 해

translation.en: [soldier 2] Don't have to move. It's okay.
Still going for it, are we?
Come on. Let's go. Let's do it.
The rifles.
No, we can overwhelm them. We easily outnumber their bullets.
translation.ko: 우리가 쪽 수로 이겨 총알로 감당 못 할 인원이야

translation.en: [Gilliam] This is it.
[Edgar] Curtis, come on. We're outta time, man. You gotta do it now.
translation.ko: 커티스, 가자 지금 안 하면 시간이 없어

translation.en: They've got no bullets! They've got no bullets!
[Edgar] Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
[soldier 1] Close the gate quick! Shut it!
I'm fine, Grey. You go, now!
Namgoong Minsoo. Kronole addict.
That explains a lot, doesn't it?
translation.ko: '냄쿵민수, 크로놀 중독자' 안 봐도 뻔하네 서둘러, 에드가

translation.en: -Hurry up, Edgar. -Hurry up?
So sorry for keeping you all waiting.
'Cause obviously I work here or something.
-Open it. -[Edgar] Here we go.
-Hey. -[snaps fingers] Kronole head.
So, this is Kronole. Hear it's pretty big in the front section.
translation.ko: 이게 크로놀이야? 앞 칸에서 아주 인기라며?

translation.en: Careful. That's how these guys hallucinate.
It's industrial waste. And it's highly flammable.
Are you Namgoong Minsoo? Security specialist?
Did you design all the door locks and security systems on the train?
translation.ko: 열차 출입문과 보안 시스템을 모두 당신이 설계했나?

translation.en: [Edgar] Look at him, man. He's gone. Look at his eyes.
He fried his brain with that fucking shite.
Are you Nam?
Nam, are you listening?
[robot] Yes, I'm listening, fuck.
[robot] Unknown words found. Please try again with correct vocabulary.
translation.ko: 단어를 찾을 수 없습니다 올바른 단어로 다시 시도하세요

translation.en: We need your help.
We're going to the front,
and we need you to open up the gates.
Uncut, straight from the barrel.
Every door you open, you get one lump of Kronole.
[Tanya] Jesus! Marlboro Light?
[artist] I can't believe it.
Cigarettes have been extinct for more than ten years now.
I'm gonna make this real simple for you. You help us. You get your drug.
If not, we put you back where we found you.
translation.ko: 안 도와줄 거면 원래 자리로 넣어주지

translation.en: What will it be, asshole?
[Edgar] Chan.
Chan, get outta here. Skedaddle. Hey!
-Fuck off! -That's enough!
Put him back in the fucking drawer!
So you're coming with us?
[robot] One gate, two lumps of Kronole.
She's an addict too?
Nobody there.
Kronole.
[Tanya] Look at all these beds. Where is everybody?
translation.ko: 침대 좀 봐 사람은 다 어디 갔지?

translation.en: -[Edgar] Looks like they left in a hurry. -[Tanya] Hmm.
[man] There's food on the table.
This can't be a window, can it?
Still cold.
Dead.
All dead.
All right. Let's go, everyone. Stay focused.
-We didn't come here for this. -[Edgar] You heard the man. Let's go.
translation.ko: 집중해 구경 온 거 아니야 들었지? 가자고

translation.en: Nam. Nam!
Kronole.
How'd you know there was nobody there?
[Yona] He's running.
Paul?
Paul.
The hell's he doing?
-[Curtis] He looks so different. -[Edgar] Paul!
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 짓이지? 폴! 딴사람 같아

translation.en: Just a second. It used to be automatic, but parts went extinct.
-It's not the Paul I remember. -No.
-[Paul] So long, goodbye. Finito. -Paul! It's Curtis.
They ain't coming back. So, now I gotta do it… [grunts]
Whoo! Manually.
So, that's how it's made. Oh. Still hot.
Wow! Look at them all. Man, you do some nice work.
translation.ko: 와, 이것 좀 보게 실력 대단한데?

translation.en: That's right. There's your food. There's your protein blocks.
translation.ko: 그럼! 그게 우리가 먹는 단백질 블록이야!

translation.en: [Curtis] Is this why they took you? To make this garbage?
translation.ko: 이 쓰레기를 만들라고 널 데려간 거야?

translation.en: Paul?
You been alone this whole time?
In the zone!
-We're going to the front. Come with us. -Alright.
translation.ko: 앞 칸으로 같이 가자 오호라, 앞 칸에 간다? 그거 좋지!

translation.en: You going to the front? Yeah, man! But, no way, man.
translation.ko: 오호라, 앞 칸에 간다? 그거 좋지! 하지만 가긴 어딜 가 내 자리는 여기잖아?

translation.en: My place is here, right?
translation.ko: 하지만 가긴 어딜 가 내 자리는 여기잖아?

translation.en: Here? Making this crap? Why?
[Curtis] You can't draw this.
Okay.
Oh man… [chuckles]
All this time, we've been eating this shit?
Hey! I eat 'em too, you know?
Every single day.
Where did you get this?
Have you been the one writing these?
[scoffs] I don't write 'em. I…
Why do you have this? Who gave this to you?
They just leave them for me, man.
I put them in the protein blocks.
translation.ko: 난 단백질 블록에 넣어서 보내기만 한 거야!

translation.en: I-- I send them on. That's it.
translation.ko: 난 단백질 블록에 넣어서 보내기만 한 거야! "물"

translation.en: The water supply section?
Yeah. It's just a few cars up. It's where the water's cleansed and recycled.
translation.ko: 네, 몇 칸 앞에 있어요 거기서 정수해서 재활용하죠

translation.en: It's one of the most crucial sections in the train.
translation.ko: 기차에서 가장 중요한 칸 중 하나군

translation.en: [Curtis] If we take it, we have the upper hand?
We don't even have to go to the very front.
translation.ko: 그럼 맨 앞 칸까지 갈 필요도 없을 거야

translation.en: We control the water. We control the negotiation.
translation.ko: 물을 장악하면 협상을 주도할 수 있지

translation.en: Hi. Hi, excuse me. Sorry to bother you there.
Can I get you a glass of water or something to speed this up?
translation.ko: 물이라도 한 컵 드시면 속도가 날까요?

translation.en: Would you get on with it, man? You're keeping us fucking waiting!
translation.ko: 야, 빨리 못 해! 다들 목 빠지게 기다리잖아!

translation.en: -[robot] Am I? -[Edgar] Yeah, you are.
Although you have been fucking smelling that flammable shite,
that time is probably a distant fucking concept for you, isn't it?
Here we go again. Kronole this, Kronole that.
Christ almighty, man, do some fucking work!
Are you a bit thick? That's what you ask for each time you open a gate.
translation.ko: 적반하장이네 네가 문 열 때마다 달라며?

translation.en: [Curtis] Yona. It's Yona, right?
How old are you?
Seventeen.
Seventeen. You're a train baby then.
How about you?
Seventeen years on Earth. Seventeen years in the tail section.
Earth?
What was it like?
I don't remember.
Why?
I don't wanna remember anything before I met Gilliam.
translation.ko: 길리엄을 만나기 전의 일은 기억하기 싫어

translation.en: Yona.
Are you clairvoyant?
Clairvoyant? What's that?
Well, you always seem to know what's behind the gates.
translation.ko: 문 뒤에 뭐가 있는지 아는 것 같아서

translation.en: Do you see things in your mind?
Don't open it.
[Curtis] What?
Be careful.
Yeah. You too.
Team two, move!
Move forward!
Passing Yekaterina Bridge!
[woman in Korean] Passing Yekaterina Bridge!
Shit. We're at the bridge, guys!
Ten, nine, eight, seven, six,
five, four, three, two, one.
Happy New Year!
Happy New Year!
Fucking hate getting older. I fucking hate it.
-[man in Japanese] Wilford forever! -[soldiers in Japanese] Forever! Forever!
Everybody down!
Hang on!
Impact!
Not yet! A second one!
[woman] Stay down!
Hey, Nam, what are you doing, man? What are you doing?
He's high as a fucking kite.
Safe passage.
[in Korean] Safe passage.
[man 2] What was that?
One, two, three. One, two--
translation.ko: 하나, 둘, 셋 하나, 둘, 셋

translation.en: Happy Yekaterina Bridge, you filthy ingrates!
translation.ko: 예카테리나 브리지 통과해서 좋기도 하겠다, 배은망덕한 것들

translation.en: You people, who if not for the benevolent Wilford,
translation.ko: 너희 같은 종자는 자애로운 윌포드 님이 없었다면

translation.en: would have frozen solid 18 years ago today.
You people,
who have suckled the generous titty of Wilford ever since
translation.ko: 그날 이후로 자비로운 윌포드 님이 베푸신 음식과 안식처를 쪽쪽 빨아먹더니

translation.en: for food and shelter.
And now,
in front of our hallowed water supply section, no less,
translation.ko: 다른 곳도 아닌 신성한 급수 칸 앞에서!

translation.en: you repay his kindness with violent hooliganism.
You scum!
Precisely 74% of you shall die.
My friend, you suffer from the misplaced optimism of the doomed.
translation.ko: 우리 친구들이 헛바람이 들어 명을 재촉하는구나

translation.en: This is going to be good.
What? What did he say?
He said, "You guys are fucked."
-[Curtis] A tunnel? -Mm-hmm.
-A fucking long one. -[Nam in Korean] What are you doing? Run.
Everybody back!
Back! Go!
-[speaking Korean] -[grunts]
Chan, get outta here.
Chan! We need fire!
Chan! Bring the fire!
Tell them in the back we need to get the fire up here!
-Tell them in the back now! -[match flicks]
Gotcha! Motherfucker!
Officer Fuyu! What are you doing?
Don't look at me, you dozy bugger. Look there!
Help me down and stop squeezing my legs.
Surrender! Surrender!
Surrender! He'll kill me if we don't surrender!
translation.ko: 항복하십시오! 항복 안 하면 제가 죽어요!

translation.en: [in Japanese] Shit.
[Edgar] Curtis!
Stop!
Stop! Everybody!
Drop your weapons!
Stop!
[Curtis] Everybody stop!
Do what he says, for crying out loud!
translation.ko: 제발 이 사람이 시키는 대로 하라고

translation.en: [Curtis] Drop your weapons!
Survivors!
Wash yourselves.
The water supply section.
Wash away the blood.
[Tanya] Have you seen these kids, hmm?
I-- I don't know anything about--
Look, where are they, you bitch?
translation.ko: 잘 봐, 어디 있냐고 나쁜 년아

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know. It's not me.
translation.ko: 몰라, 난 몰라 내가 안 그랬어

translation.en: Not me! [whimpers]
Tell us, or I'll cut your fucking arm off even shorter than mine, you bastard.
translation.ko: 말 안 하면 팔을 나보다 바짝 잘라주마

translation.en: Wilford… Wilford knows!
Will-- Wilford-- Wilford likes kids.
He does. That's why he sends that-- that yellow one, Claude, to get them for him.
translation.ko: 진짜야, 그래서 노란 옷의 클로드가 애들 구하러 다녀

translation.en: It-- it's Wilford you want, not me!
[Gilliam] Wilford likes kids?
All he cares about is his wretched engine.
The engine is sacred.
And Wilford is divine.
Wilford is merciful.
Call him.
See if he'll come save you.
[Gilliam] Yes.
Wilford the Merciful. Call him.
He won't come here. He won't leave his engine.
translation.ko: 안 오실 거야 엔진을 떠날 수 없으시니까

translation.en: We're gonna rip you into little pieces. He still won't come?
But we control the water. If we turn that off, he'll have to come.
translation.ko: 물이 우리 손에 있으니 물을 잠그면 오겠지

translation.en: Turn off the water?
Well, you'll only be condemning your own people.
The water comes from the front.
The nose of the train breaks up the snow and ice and… and turns it into water.
translation.ko: 기차 앞머리로 눈과 얼음을 분쇄해 물을 만들거든

translation.en: Like an elephant's trunk. [chuckles]
The water comes in the mouth,
not in the bum, Curtis.
Yes. Wilford knows you well, Mr. Curtis Everett.
translation.ko: 그래, 윌포드 님도 널 아셔 커티스 에버렛

translation.en: He's been watching you.
And we know you won't harm your own people.
translation.ko: 네가 꼬리 칸 사람들을 해칠 리 없다는 것도 알아

translation.en: Too bad you couldn't save your second-in-command.
-What was his name? Edgar? -Shut the fuck up!
Curtis! Curtis! I can help you!
You can fucking die is what you can do.
No, I can help you! I swear it!
Listen! Listen to me.
Wilford won't come here. He's not coming.
translation.ko: 윌포드 님은 여기 안 와 안 오신다고!

translation.en: You've got to go to him.
And I can take you.
translation.ko: 내가 데려다줄게 난 열차를 잘 알잖아

translation.en: I know the train. I can guarantee you safe passage.
translation.ko: 내가 데려다줄게 난 열차를 잘 알잖아 나랑 가면 무사통과야

translation.en: Why the fuck would I trust you?
Because I want to live.
So you'd sell out Wilford the Benevolent?
If I take you to the front, you have to kill him.
translation.ko: 앞 칸까지 데려다줄 테니까 윌포드를 죽여

translation.en: I'll get you close enough. You kill him, and let me live.
translation.ko: 가까이 데려다줄게 윌포드를 죽이고 나를 살려

translation.en: Curtis.
Are you still determined to push ahead?
Of course. We're not even halfway.
You already got further than anyone else.
Better than McGregor four years ago.
Ten cars, twenty cars, it doesn't matter unless we make it to the engine.
translation.ko: 엔진까지 못 가면 어디까지 가건 무의미해요

translation.en: They'll just regroup and attack us again.
translation.ko: 놈들이 조직을 재편해 우리를 칠 겁니다

translation.en: Gotta pull 'em out by the roots.
But so many have been killed.
We've lost so many.
I know.
[Gilliam] Have you seen our men? They're exhausted.
I told them to wash themselves,
so that I can assess the damage.
Let me go ahead.
I got Mason now. I can move a lot faster.
translation.ko: 메이슨이 있으니 훨씬 빨리 나아갈 수 있어요

translation.en: You stay here with the wounded, guard the prisoners.
When we take the engine, I'll call for you to lead us.
Stop it, Curtis. Why are you doing that?
You know very well that you're already our leader.
translation.ko: 자네도 알잖아 우리 지도자는 이미 자네일세

translation.en: You have to accept that now.
How can I lead if I have two good arms?
translation.ko: 두 팔이 멀쩡한데 어떻게 남을 이끌겠습니까?

translation.en: [Gilliam] It's faded a lot.
Better to have both arms. Can't do a lot with one, you know?
translation.ko: 양팔이 있는 게 낫지 외팔로 무슨 일을 하겠나

translation.en: Especially when you hold a woman. Much better to have two arms, wouldn't you agree?
translation.ko: 여자를 안을 때만 해도 두 팔이 훨씬 낫잖아?

translation.en: When you get to the narrow bridge, big gate with a "W" on,
translation.ko: 좁은 다리까지 가면 W가 박힌 대문이 나와

translation.en: Wilford's behind that.
Don't let Wilford talk.
Cut out his tongue.
[artist] Okay, let's all get in there. Squeeze in.
[artist] Perfect. Perfect. The hat becomes you well.
Now, Grey…
you must go with Curtis.
[artist] Oops, forgot somebody.
Okay.
Kronole.
Don't mind me. Back to work, everyone. Back to work.
translation.ko: 나 신경 쓰지 말고 하던 일 계속해

translation.en: -[man in Japanese] Minister, are you okay? -[in Japanese] I'm fine.
-Please, don't eat it. Don't eat it. -No, no, no, they're very friendly.
translation.ko: 먹지 마세요 아니야, 우리 편이야 안 물어

translation.en: They won't bite. Well, they might bite a tomato but…
translation.ko: 아니야, 우리 편이야 안 물어 토마토는 물지도 모르겠다

translation.en: Hey.
Do any of you feel like sushi?
Hell yeah! Line that shit up.
Right? [scoffs]
[Mason] You people are very lucky.
This is only served twice in a year. In January and July.
Why? Not enough fish?
Oh, enough is not the criterion.
Balance.
You see, this aquarium is a closed ecological system,
and, um, the number of individual units must be very closely, precisely controlled,
translation.ko: 개체 수를 아주 정확하고 엄격하게 관리해야만

translation.en: in order to maintain the proper sustainable balance.
translation.ko: 최적화된 균형 상태를 지속할 수 있거든

translation.en: [Curtis] No.
You eat this.
You know what that's made of?
Dig in.
Curtis, my friend, do you think we might dispense with the restraints for the next section?
translation.ko: 우리 친구 커티스 씨 다음 칸은 수갑 풀고 갈까?

translation.en: I'm not your friend.
And why would I?
Uh, for… for the sake of the young. Education.
Quiet! Quiet!
Good morning, children.
I am pleased to present guests from the tail section.
[teacher] Yes! And what do we say to tail section guests, children?
translation.ko: 그럼 꼬리 칸 손님들께 뭐라고 말해야 할까요?

translation.en: [students] Good morning, tail section guests!
Timmy!
-Timmy? -Andy! Andy?
This little boy, his name is Timmy.
This is my son.
-Please take a good look at the picture. -I saw them!
translation.ko: 내 아들이야 이 그림을 봐주겠니? 제가 봤어요

translation.en: -When? -Where?
Came through there, went through there.
Is that all, boy?
Yes.
Were they crying?
No, but they looked like they wanted to.
I heard all tail-sectioners
were lazy dogs who sat all day in their own shit.
translation.ko: 꼬리 칸 사람들은 하도 게을러서 온종일 자기들이 싼 똥에서 잔다고 들었어요

translation.en: No! They're very nice!
And very just and merciful. So it is.
Minister Mason, we were just about to show a video.
translation.ko: 메이슨 총리님 영상 수업을 할 차례였어요

translation.en: [Mason] Very good.
Wilford!
[narrator] From a very young age, Mr. Wilford's love of locomotives was apparent.
translation.ko: 윌포드 님은 어렸을 적부터 기차를 유독 사랑하셨습니다

translation.en: When I grow up, I'm gonna live on a train, forever.
translation.ko: 어른이 되면 기차에서 영원히 살 거예요

translation.en: Forever!
His early dreams were realized when he founded his transportation empire,
translation.ko: 어릴 적 꿈이 실현된 건 윌포드 인더스트리라는 교통 제국을 설립하면서죠

translation.en: the Wilford Industries.
But his greatest dream was to construct a luxury locomotive cruise line,
translation.ko: 하지만 윌포드 님의 꿈은 전 세계를 하나로 묶는

translation.en: connecting railways of the entire world into one.
translation.ko: 초호화 유람 열차 노선을 만드는 거였답니다!

translation.en: [narrator] A circular railway that extends for 438,000 kilometers
translation.ko: "새해 첫날, 성탄절 추수감사절, 노동절" 총장 438,000km의 순환 철도로

translation.en: and completes one circle every year.
Impervious to the extreme cold of the Arctic and the scorching heat of the African desert,
translation.ko: 북극의 혹한과 아프리카 사막의 고온에도 끄떡없는

translation.en: Wilford's Miracle Train is self-sustaining
translation.ko: 이 기적의 열차는 자급자족이 가능하고 최첨단 디자인과 설계로...

translation.en: and possesses the most sophisticated design and advanced technology--
As hard as it is to believe,
people in the Old World made fun of Mr. Wilford.
They criticized him for over-engineering and over-equipping this wonderful train.
translation.ko: 이 멋진 열차를 두고 기술과 자원 낭비라고 비난했죠

translation.en: But Mr. Wilford knew something they did not.
translation.ko: 하지만 윌포드 님은 그들이 모르는 걸 아셨어요

translation.en: And what was that?
Old World people were frigging morons who got turned into popsicles.
translation.ko: 구시대 사람들은 돌대가리라 얼음과자가 된다는 거요

translation.en: [teacher] Well, sort of.
Mr. Wilford knew that CW-7 would freeze the world.
translation.ko: 대충 맞았어요! 윌포드 님은 CW-7이 세상을 얼릴 줄 아셨어요

translation.en: So what did the prophetic Mr. Wilford invent
translation.ko: 그래서 선지자인 윌포드 님은 선택받은 자들을 구원하려고

translation.en: to protect the chosen from that calamity?
The Engine!
Rumble, rumble, rattle, rattle, it will never die!
♪ What happens if the engine stops? ♪
♪ We all freeze and die! ♪
♪ But will it stop? Oh, will it stop? ♪
♪ No, no! ♪
♪ Can you tell us why? ♪
♪ The engine is eternal, yes! ♪
♪ The engine is forever, yes! ♪
♪ Rumble, rumble, rattle, rattle ♪
♪ Who is the reason why? ♪
♪ Wilford, yeah! ♪
♪ Wilford! Wilford! Hip-hooray! ♪
Oh, I love that one. Such a tonic.
translation.ko: 이 노래 정말 좋아 기운이 샘솟지

translation.en: Oh! It's time, children! -Come this way! -[cheering]
Don't… don't trip now.
Don't push. There's plenty of room.
Who can tell me what's coming up?
The Frozen Seven!
Pay attention. This tableau will surely be on the exam.
translation.ko: 집중해요 이 장면은 시험에 꼭 나오니까

translation.en: Fifteen years ago, in the third year of the train,
seven passengers tried to stop Wilford's miracle train
translation.ko: 15년 전, 열차 운행 3년에 승객 7명이 기적의 열차를 세우고 내리려고 했어요

translation.en: and go outside.
And what do we call this event, Magdalena?
The Revolt of the Seven.
Very good. Long before you were born.
translation.ko: 참 잘했어요, 여러분이 태어나기 한참 전이죠

translation.en: Of course, they failed to stop the train. Instead, they jumped out of the running train.
translation.ko: 물론 기차를 세우지 못했고 대신에 뛰어내렸어요

translation.en: Here they come now!
There they are. That's how far they made it.
If we ever go outside the train?
We all freeze and die.
If the engine stops running?
[all] We'd all die!
And who takes care of the sacred engine?
Sir Wilford!
Children, it's the New Year eggs from Mr. Wilford!
translation.ko: 친구들, 윌포드 님이 새해 달걀을 보내셨어요

translation.en: Touch them. They're still warm.
These eggs are boiled using water heated by the sacred engine itself.
translation.ko: 성스러운 엔진으로 끓인 물로 삶은 달걀이에요

translation.en: As a special treat, we have playing for us
the world-renowned first-chair violinist of the Boston Symphony Orchestra,
translation.ko: 세계적인 보스턴 교향악단의 수석 바이올린 연주자이신

translation.en: Mr. Gerald McInster!
Is that really Gerald? He looks damn great.
Happy New Year.
No, thank you very much.
Let's go, Curtis.
[in French] Happy New Year, sir.
I thought the chicken was extinct.
Actually, many things on board were rumored to be extinct.
translation.ko: 이 열차에는 멸종됐다고 소문난 것들도 많이 있어요

translation.en: Such as?
This.
Andrew! No!
It wasn't me! It wasn't me!
[Curtis] No.
[Tanya] Curtis! Curtis!
You have to lead us.
Curtis, my friend, we understand each other.
Listen to my words. It wasn't me!
We go forward.
Open.
Mason.
Shit. Check her pulse.
Hey, hey! Firearm regulations! To minimize dam--
[soldier 1] God, that does not look good.
[soldier 2] Hurry, hurry. You got the master key, right?
Wait! Don't shoot. Please don't shoot!
You just killed a front-section passenger!
translation.ko: 지금 앞 칸 승객을 죽인 겁니다, 이건...

translation.en: [soldier 2] I didn't see a thing.
Where you going? Wait, just wait a minute.
Can we talk about this for one second?
You son of a bitch!
[in Korean] Close the door, jerk.
Tanya.
My Timmy.
My Timmy.
We're gonna find him. [sniffs] I promise.
[softly] I know.
Thank you.
[man 2] Hey, turn around, motherfucker. You got my Kronole!
translation.ko: 어디 가, 이 새끼야 그거 내 크로놀이야!

translation.en: [man 1] Don't make me come after you. I want that shit!
[man 1] I'm coming after you. I want my Kronole back!
I swear, man, I'm gonna kill you, you spaced-out fuck!
Open the door.
Kronole? More Kronole?
-Here. Take it. -[grunting]
Open it! Open the gate!
[robot] You should be grateful.
[robot] The world's last cigarette, you tail-section pig.
translation.ko: 이것은 세계 최후의 담배다 꼬리 칸 놈아

translation.en: You ever been to the tail section?
[Curtis] Any idea what went on back there? When we boarded?
translation.ko: 우리가 열차에 탈 때 어땠는지 상상이나 가?

translation.en: It was chaos.
Yeah, we didn't freeze to death, but we didn't have time to be thankful.
Wilford's soldiers came, and they took everything.
translation.ko: 윌포드의 군대가 와서 모든 걸 약탈해 갔으니까

translation.en: A thousand people in an iron box. No food, no water.
translation.ko: 천 명이 음식도 물도 없이 쇳덩이에 갇힌 거지

translation.en: After a month, we ate the weak.
You know what I hate about myself?
I know what people taste like.
I know that babies taste best.
There was a woman.
She was hiding with her baby.
And some men with knives came.
They killed her, and they took her baby.
And then an old man…
no relation, just… ...an old man,
stepped forward and he said, "Give me the knife."
translation.ko: 앞으로 나와 그러는 거야 '칼 이리 내'

translation.en: And everyone thought he'd kill the baby himself.
translation.ko: 다들 노인이 아기를 죽일 줄 알았어

translation.en: But he took the knife…
and he cut off his arm.
And he said, "Eat this if you're so hungry."
"Eat… eat this. Just leave the baby."
I had never seen anything like that.
And the men put down their knives.
Probably guessed who that old man was.
That baby was Edgar.
And I was the man with the knife.
I killed Edgar's mother.
And then, one by one, other people in the tail section started cutting off arms and legs
translation.ko: 그 후로 꼬리 칸 사람들은 저마다 팔다리를 잘라서

translation.en: and offering them.
It was like a miracle.
And I wanted to… I tried. I just…
A month later, Wilford's soldiers brought those protein blocks.
translation.ko: 한 달 후, 윌포드의 군대가 단백질 블록을 가져왔고

translation.en: We've been eating that shit ever since.
Eighteen years, I've hated Wilford.
Eighteen years, I've waited for this moment.
And now I'm here.
Open the gate.
Please.
And freeze to death? What are you, fucking crazy?
translation.ko: 그다음엔 얼어 죽자고? 진짜 미친 거야?

translation.en: You gotta take it easy on that Kronole.
Snorting that flammable shit is gonna fry your brain.
translation.ko: 그런 인화 물질 흡입하면 뇌가 타버려

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing?
[Curtis] Take that off the door.
Curtis Everett,
I've been asked to extend a formal invitation from Mr. Wilford to join him for dinner.
translation.ko: 윌포드 님의 저녁 식사 초대를 전달하러 왔습니다

translation.en: After you.
Curtis, is that you?
Curtis, dear boy, come in.
Let's take a look at you.
You hungry?
You did a man's work coming all this way.
Please, sit down.
You are the first human being to have walked the total length of this train.
translation.ko: 열차 꼬리에서 엔진까지 전체를 걸은 사람은

translation.en: Tail to engine.
Did you know that? Well done. Bravo.
None of your people have ever been here. To the engine.
translation.ko: 그쪽 사람들은 아무도 엔진까지 온 적이 없지

translation.en: I've never been to the tail section.
translation.ko: 난 꼬리 칸에 가본 적이 없고

translation.en: Why not? Too dirty for you?
Don't wanna rub against the vermin of the tail section?
Do you think my station is without its own drawbacks?
It's noisy. And it's lonely.
Right.
Steaks.
Plenty of room. This whore to bring you anything you want.
translation.ko: 스테이크에 넓은 공간에 뭐든 대령하는 암캐까지 부리면서

translation.en: Curtis, everyone has their preordained position,
translation.ko: 커티스, 누구나 미리 정해진 자리가 있고

translation.en: and everyone is in their place except you.
translation.ko: 자네만 빼고는 모두 그 자리를 지켜

translation.en: That's what people in the best place say to people in the worst place.
translation.ko: 그건 꼭대기에서 밑바닥을 보며 하는 소리지

translation.en: There's not a soul on this train who wouldn't trade places with you.
translation.ko: 이 열차에 당신 자리를 마다할 사람은 없어

translation.en: Would you trade places with me?
Fuck you.
Curtis, dear boy.
The fact is, we're all stuck inside this blasted train.
translation.ko: 이 망할 열차에 갇힌 건 모두가 마찬가지야

translation.en: We are all prisoners in this hunk of metal.
translation.ko: 이 쇳덩어리 안에서 우린 똑같은 죄수지

translation.en: Medium rare?
And this train is a closed ecosystem.
We must always strive for balance.
The air, water, food supply.
The population must always be kept in balance.
translation.ko: 공기, 물, 식량 공급, 인구 모두 균형을 지켜야 해

translation.en: For optimum balance, however, there were times
translation.ko: 최적화를 위해서 다소 과격한 해결책이 사용된 때도 있지

translation.en: when more radical solutions were required
translation.ko: 다소 과격한 해결책이 사용된 때도 있지

translation.en: when the population needed to be reduced rather… drastically.
translation.ko: 급격한 인구 감소가 필요한 때 말이야

translation.en: We don't have time for true natural selection.
translation.ko: 자연히 도태되는 걸 바랄 처지가 아니잖나

translation.en: We would all be hideously overcrowded and starve waiting for that.
translation.ko: 열차는 미어터지고 기다리다 굶어 죽을 테니까

translation.en: The next best solution is to have individual units kill off other individual units.
translation.ko: 차선책은 한 집단이 타 집단을 죽이는 거야

translation.en: From time to time, we've had to stir the pot, so to speak.
translation.ko: 가끔 한 번씩 소요를 부추길 필요가 있어

translation.en: The Revolt of the Seven.
The McGregor Riots. The Great Curtis Revolution.
A blockbuster production with a devilishly unpredictable plot.
translation.ko: 블록버스터로 기획했지만 전개는 완전히 예측 불허였어

translation.en: Who could've predicted your counterattack with the torch in Yekaterina Tunnel?
translation.ko: 예카테리나 터널에서 횃불 반격이라니 누가 알았겠나?

translation.en: Pure genius. That wasn't what Gilliam and I had in our plan.
translation.ko: 자네 정말 천재야 길리엄과 내 기획안엔 없었거든

translation.en: What?
Now don't tell me you didn't know. Gilliam and I. Our plan.
translation.ko: 모르는 척하긴 길리엄과 나, 공동 기획이야

translation.en: Gilliam?
Gilliam.
The front and the tail are supposed to work together.
translation.ko: 앞 칸과 꼬리 칸은 협력하는 관계야

translation.en: He was, uh, more than a partner, really.
He was my friend.
Bullshit. I don't believe you.
[scoffs] Our original agreement was for the insurgency to end at the Yekaterina Tunnel.
translation.ko: 원래는 예카테리나 터널에서 반란을 끝내기로 했었어

translation.en: And all the survivors would go back to the tail section to enjoy much more space.
translation.ko: 생존자는 꼬리 칸에 돌아가 전보다 널찍하게 사는 거지

translation.en: You're a fucking liar. Gilliam would never do that.
translation.ko: 거짓말 집어치워 길리엄은 절대 안 그래

translation.en: Uh, it all worked out in the end.
Your counterattack actually made the insurgency ten times more exciting.
Unfortunately, the front suffered more losses than anticipated and, uh…
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 앞 칸이 예상 밖의 피해를 입었고

translation.en: Gilliam had to… [clicks tongue] …pay the price.
Ironic, isn't it?
How people dramatically cross that thin barrier between life and death?
translation.ko: 생과 사의 운명이 얼마나 극적으로 갈리는지 몰라

translation.en: Now there's just one last thing for us to do.
-[beeps] -Tally up the numbers.
Hello, Wilford. It's me.
I'm at Gilliam's place.
Hold on.
Is it still the same number?
Yes. It still stands at 74%.
Okay. Carry on.
But, wait. Wait.
Spare 18 to celebrate our 18th year.
It's, uh… an excellent idea. Yes.
Your people.
God damn it, Claude, mind the engine!
She's getting sensitive recently.
Sit down and mind your table manners.
Just relax.
Calm down.
Boy, now I see what Gilliam meant. He told me you were brilliant and clever
translation.ko: 길리엄 말을 이제 이해하겠네 똑똑하고 영리하지만 항상 경직돼 있다고

translation.en: but always so tense.
When's the last time you got laid, hmm?
Like Gilliam said, holding a woman is much better with two arms.
translation.ko: 길리엄 말대로 팔이 두 개인 편이 훨씬 나아

translation.en: I'll miss Gilliam.
I'll miss our late-night phone chats. [chuckles]
He could go on for hours. All with only one arm.
translation.ko: 몇 시간이고 수다를 떨었지 한 손으로 수화기를 들고

translation.en: What's with that face? Hmm? What's the matter?
You look like a crazy person.
As if there aren't enough crazies on this train.
translation.ko: 이 열차에 넘쳐나는 게 미친 사람인데

translation.en: [in Korean] Die… you punk!
I believe it is easier for someone to survive on this train if they have some level of insanity.
translation.ko: 이 열차에서는 좀 미쳐야 살아남기가 수월하지

translation.en: I mean, as Gilliam well understood,
we need to maintain a proper balance of anxiety and fear,
chaos and horror, in order to keep life going.
translation.ko: 적정 비율로 유지해야 삶이 원활히 돌아가

translation.en: And if we don't have that, we need to invent it.
In that sense, The Great Curtis Revolution you invented
translation.ko: 그런 점에서 자네가 창작한 커티스 대혁명은 진정한 걸작이야

translation.en: was truly a masterpiece.
translation.ko: 자네가 창작한 커티스 대혁명은 진정한 걸작이야

translation.en: [Wilford] Come with me, Curtis.
Something I want to show you. You deserve it.
translation.ko: 보여줄 게 있어 자네라면 자격이 있네

translation.en: Come on.
She's waking up now.
Cozy, yes? Peaceful.
You are now in her heart.
I've devoted my entire life to this.
The Eternal Engine.
It is eternity itself.
Have you ever been alone on this train?
translation.ko: 이 열차에서 혼자 있었던 적 있나?

translation.en: When was the last time you were alone?
You can't remember, can you?
So, please do take your time.
[Wilford] I just wrote it.
It's for you, Curtis.
Here.
I am old.
I want you to take my station.
It's what you always wanted.
It's what Gilliam wanted too.
You must tend the engine. Keep her humming.
Look, Curtis. Beyond the gate.
Section after section, precisely where they've always been
translation.ko: 제자리를 지키는 칸들이 꼬리를 물고 이어져

translation.en: and where they'll always be. All adding up to what?
translation.ko: 그 모든 게 합쳐져 무엇이 되나?

translation.en: The train.
And now the perfectly correct number of human beings,
all in their proper places, all adding up to what?
translation.ko: 엄격히 지키고 있는 사람들의 숫자를 합치면?

translation.en: Humanity.
The train is the world. We, the humanity.
And now you have the sacred responsibility to lead all of humanity.
translation.ko: 이제 자네는 전 인류를 이끄는 성스러운 임무를 얻었어

translation.en: Without you, Curtis, humanity will cease to exist.
translation.ko: 커티스, 자네가 없으면 인류는 멸종할 걸세

translation.en: You've seen what people do without leadership.
They devour one another.
No bullets.
Look at them.
That's how people are.
You know. You've seen this.
You've been this.
Ridiculous, pathetic, aren't they?
You can save them from themselves.
This is what Gilliam saved you for.
Curtis.
This is your destiny.
Curtis! The match!
The space only allows for a very small person.
translation.ko: 좁아서 몸이 작아야만 들어갈 수 있지

translation.en: Young children under five.
The engine lasts forever, but not so all of its parts.
translation.ko: 엔진은 영원하지만 부품까지 영원한 건 아니야

translation.en: That piece of equipment went extinct recently.
We needed a replacement.
Thank goodness the tail section manufactures a steady supply of kids.
translation.ko: 꾸준히 아이를 공급해주는 꼬리 칸 덕분에

translation.en: So, we can keep going manually.
You fucking bastard!
Yona.
Take the fire.
[Curtis] Andy? Is that you?
[groans] Andy.
You remember me?
Andy, stop! Listen to me.
translation.ko: 앤디, 하지 마 내 말 들어

translation.en: Don't go up those stairs. Listen!
Andy!
Come here. Come over here.
Andy! Listen to me!
Get outta there!
Get out! God damn it, Andy, listen to me!
Oh, Curtis. Don't be so melodramatic.
You know everyone has their own preordained position.
translation.ko: 누구나 정해진 자리가 있는 걸 자네도 알잖아

translation.en: Nice.
[in English] Stay here.
